translations: 美国南部产的黄绿色大粒葡萄；斯卡珀农葡萄

sentences.sentence: The wines and liqueurs and champagnes of new orleans were new and exhilarating to her acquainted with only homemade blackberry and scuppernong vintages and aunt pitty's "swoon" brandy;
sentences.translation: 新奥尔良的葡萄酒，露酒的香槟，对她说来都很新鲜，喝下去感到心旷神怡，因为她只喝过自家酿制的黑莓酒、野葡萄酒和皮蒂姑妈的“一喝不醉”的白兰地。
